articles.title: Eddie Nketiah admits frustration with lack of game time since signing new Arsenal contract - Daily Mail
articles.description: Nketiah was days away from leaving Arsenal before signing a new five-year deal back in June. Following the signing of Gabriel Jesus, however, he has started only one match.
articles.content:
Eddie Nketiah admits he is frustrated by a lack of game time after committing his future to Arsenal, but the striker remains hopeful he can force his way into the first team.
